title: Razer celebrates Star Wars day with a Stormtrooper Xbox controller
content:
Razer is well-known for making all kinds of gaming accessories, and to celebrate May 4th – also known as Star Wars day – the company is introducing a new edition of its Xbox wireless controller. The new Razer Stormtrooper Wireless Controller arrives alongside a charging stand that completes the look, and it’s very much in

The post Razer celebrates Star Wars day with a Stormtrooper Xbox controller appeared first on XDA.
description: Razer has announed a new Stormtrooper edition of its Xbox controller and charging stand, just in time to celebrate May 4th. It costs $199.99.
